about_the_game:
SoundSc@pes is an interactive audio sample player. It features an intuitive user interface that emphasizes fast iteration and creativity. Shape your sounds with effects like pitch shift, reverb, equalization, and distortion. Become immersed in reactive, procedurally generated animations as you discover new ways to express yourself through sound.

- Eleven playable pads per sound bank with support for touchscreen interfaces

- Features Pitch Shift, Sample Playback Position / Sample Reverse, Reverb, Filter / EQ, Distortion, and Volume

- Modulate parameters with two complex Low Frequency Oscillation (LFO) banks

- Explore Rhythm or Melody with one push of a button

- Tinker with procedurally generated audio reactive fractal animations

- Unique work flow that emphasizes fast iteration, live performance, and no drop down menus.

- Perfect for both beginners and seasoned electronic musicians

___________________________________________________________________________________________________________

- Use Wired Headphones or Speakers. Bluetooth introduces >100ms of latency and will cause noticable delay in audio output.

- Designed to work with Akai MPD218 Midi pad controller, partial support for many other midi devices.

* Midi aftertouch is not supported and will overload the input buffer. Please turn off Midi aftertouch at the device (hardware) level.*

___________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Special thanks to Brandon Howard, Nevin Foster, Peter Olthof, Gary Scavone, and Keijiro Takahashi

Contact Info: colinstets@gmail.com
___________________________________________________________________________________________________________
